features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate and modern take on the classic mango (paisley) motif. The design features a series of interconnected gold circles, each adorned with sparkling diamonds. Alternating with these circles are the meticulously crafted mango-shaped pendants, pavé-set with diamonds and finished with fine milgrain detailing. The central pendant is slightly larger and features a small ruby, adding a touch of traditional South Indian auspiciousness (Shubham).

description: This 'Manasa' Haaram blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a contemporary design sensibility. The use of high-quality diamonds and 22K gold ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, warm glow. The delicate mango design, a symbol of prosperity and fertility, makes this necklace an ideal heirloom piece. The necklace is lightweight and comfortable, making it perfect for all-day wear.
